website_summaries.verdict: Net with a small 4" x 4" mesh that ensures even small items will remain in place.
pros: Uses a tough webbing that has plenty of elasticity to give you a high level of performance
Offers dimensions of 4' x 6', but can stretch to cover a space of 8' x 12', which works great when you have some taller items
Uses 12 D-clip carabiners to secure the net in place
cons: Carabiners don't have a spring-back closure mechanism

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Bacon!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit to do the rear brakes on my 2011 Ford Mustang. I tried multiple more generic tools sold at auto parts stores without success. I finally admitted defeat, put the old equipment back on the car, and ordered this kit. Without this kit, I would not have been able to compress the piston. It worked exactly as advertised. One thing to note - it comes with instructions and a listing of manufacturers that each piece typically works with. The fitting that I ultimately needed was not listed as compatible with Ford, so some trial and error may be required depending on your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: Very excellent quality and heavy duty construction. The 4" grid provides better coverage than the cheaper nets with the 6" grids. Heavier multiple cords are much stronger than any cargo nets that I have owned. I highly recommend this cargo net and would definately purchase again! Unfortunately, the metal clips are cheap light duty and three failed durning the first use. I suggest replacing them with better quality 3" carabiner clips.
customer_reviews.author: BG_NorCal

customer_reviews.title: Great cargo net
customer_reviews.text: Great cargo net! I used it for the first time this weekend and was satisfied with how well I could adapt the net to my load. I had plastic bags, small boxes and larger garbage bags loaded in the bed. It was a rainy stormy drive home from the beach through the mountains, I was surprised that nothing moved during the trip, the bed was not full. Great net, highly recommend. Side note: I used bungees along the sides, and across the cab width and attached the net creating a perimeter.
customer_reviews.author: Lafayette Hatchel

customer_reviews.title: Great tool at a great price - VW and Mercedes
customer_reviews.text: So, I have 2 Mercedes (07 W211, 08 X164) and 2 VWs (03 Jetta TDI, 17 GTI) in household. I ordered these to compress the Jetta's brakes and apply some stop-squeal on them. This tool is awesome - wish I had bought sooner. The 1 negative reviewer who said he coudlnt find a disk to match - while I believe it, sounds more like an unusual occurence than the norm. While it is 'made in China' - the parts appear high quality and appear to have been coated to avoid corrosion.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by 35+ yrs Automotive Technician!!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually already had a kit like this that was purchased from one of the big three Tool Trucks! I will tell you that this kit I bought on Amazon is every bit as good as the kit that I have been using for the last 15 yrs. and costs about a third of the price!! This tool kit is definitely professional grade and will cover any screw-in type caliper system that I am aware of. Definitely worth the price and would recommend to anyone both professional or DIYer.
customer_reviews.author: Tod George

customer_reviews.title: VERY good product -sturdy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Have used this net for a variety of uses when hauling light objects in the truck. It's perfect for kayaks (see photo), and I've also used it to help secure a couch and chair while transporting. It comes with high-quality snap hooks for easy use. The net is surprisingly heavy and has every indication of lasting a very long time. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: N. Dured

customer_reviews.title: Compact kit has fit every car I've used it with, so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my shop to replace a smaller kit that didn't have all the discs I needed. I'm really happy with the kit.Â The case is compact and convenient, keeping all of the pieces in one place. I haven't come across a vehicle that it didn't fit, so far. And who couldn't use an extra pair of gloves? I'm a mechanic, but I'm sure this would be helpful for do-it-yourself jobs at home, too.
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again (2 needed for a standard truck bed)
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is that it does not stretch to 8 x 12 feet. More like 6 x 8 feet. Which is fine I'll just get another cargo net to make up the difference. Definitely worth it to purchase some S hooks if you have an old school truck bed like mine with limited in bed tie down spots... Also if you're a person like me who needs to get creative... I was able to safely haul my paddle boards down the hwy in the back of my 1 ton dually... Kind of a big deal bc those things are expensive and I didn't want to lose them or compromise the safety of others I share the road with
customer_reviews.author: S. McCready

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Good stretch/size. Poor caribiners
customer_reviews.text: Heck in love this thing. It came with a dozen or so cheap-ish caribiners, but they’re better than nothing. Big use is transporting inner tubes when staging vehicles. Pile them in, toss the net over top, clip it down. No more having to weave ratchet straps between tubes, missing one and it blowing out going down the road!
customer_reviews.author: Andrewski

customer_reviews.title: Better than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect or for our trip- we had packed all our suitcases and such in plastic tubs and covered the back with this net. We bought some climbing clips to attach it to the truck bed and it worked like magic. It’s easy to keep in the bag under a seat when it’s not in use and is easy for anyone to use. Really good buy, Much easier than a tarp to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally Complete Set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set in the many ,many decades I've worked as a professional automotive mechanic I've been through many brake tools most dont have everything needed adapter wise but this set is complete it doesnt take up too much tool box space ,its built very well and I will be using this set for a long time to come !!! Overall a Great Tool Set At An Awesome Price !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tool makes the life way easier.
customer_reviews.text: Changed front rotor/pads today on honda accord lx 2013 - beautiful. I love this set. Used before different other tools to press calipers back- so far this is the best. Looks well made. Case itself can be better but not really bad. Yes it is magnetic- adapters stick to the tool. The magnet is not really strong but Ok.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy

customer_reviews.title: Best webbing I've found
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because all the other nets I've had in the past had garbage connectors and fell apart. I use this to keep all my gear in the back of my 78 FJ40 Landcruiser. The carabiner clips are so superior to the old plastic clips. Good stretch and holding power.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M. Fye

customer_reviews.title: Has held up well for almost 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Great net for keeping stuff in your bed. Stretches to fit a full sized bed no problem with plenty of space for cargo. I bought it in May 2018 and here it is in April 2020. Only knocked off one star because a couple of the carabineers fell apart but the net itself has held up well in spite of being stored out of the bag hanging from eyelets in the bed. I have a tonnau cover but it's been exposed to damp and UV rays and is still as stretchy as ever. A good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Helmet

customer_reviews.title: Limited tie down hooks
customer_reviews.text: The netting seems strong and big enough to hold cargo in the truck bed. But, the truck has four tie down hooks located in the four corners of the bed. To get a secure tie down, I need to add aftermarket hooks to the bed. The product comes with a large number of carabiners with no place to secure them.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this cargo net! I got it to keep stored garage items from raining down on my car's hood in an earthquake. Net is thick and very stretchy. Carabiners are high quality. Lower shelves are hood high, so items may jump around in a shaker but won't fall on hood. They're the tools I use frequently and are immediately accessible below the net. Plenty of stretch if I wanted the net to cover them, too.
customer_reviews.author: AuntMeg

customer_reviews.title: cross country travel!
customer_reviews.text: Moved from the west coast to the east coast. loaded up the back of the truck like the Beverly hill billies . no matter how much i packed there was more to pack back there. for safety reasons i deiced to purchase this last min. IT SAVED MY BUTT!!! every thing stayed in place. traveling 2200 miles and nothing moved. even though its a bit stretchy, its firm and takes effort to stretch it. I would defiantly purchase again!

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.text: This cargo net is wonderful. I used it over my 6 garbage cans that I loaded into my utility trailer to take to the dumps. When I opened the package it was very easy to maneuver the netting over the cans and the snaps were very easy to attach to the netting, then to the trailer. Afterwards it was very easy to tuck away into the zippered bag it came in and I keep it in the back of my SUV until next time. No more bungie cords for me! Great Cargo Net.
customer_reviews.author: RML

customer_reviews.title: seems well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this cargo net but not for securing cargo, actually plan on mounting underneath deck I just finished building to use as a storage area for pool toys and rafts, keeps them off the ground and out of the pool when not in use. haven't completed mounting it yet, stretched it out between four of the deck posts, just need to add a few more mounting points. product arrived quickly, no damage, no issues, very happy with product, check one more to do off the list. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: PaPa G

customer_reviews.title: Net: great; Caribiners: not so much
customer_reviews.text: A great item to have when moving lots of odd-shaped items or boxes with lids (like bankers boxes) that might blow off. The net is heavy duty! My complaint is that the caribiners are poor quality - I've had 3 break after 5 or 6 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Product is just OK quality.
customer_reviews.text: After getting the cargo net it looked good. The net arrived in a zipper pouch. After unfolding the net I immediately noticed something concerning. The net was tied together in a couple spots with a weak single knot. I believed these knots would not hold so I retied them. I transported some cargo that really stretched the net. I noticed the sheath on one end of the net's bungee had torn exposing the rubber threads beneath. This net is good for light duty but not very tough quality.
customer_reviews.author: suomynona

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Moving out of state, I get tired of using tarp, it rips all the time. So, I tried this cargo net and it did fine. At inspection points they advised me to tied down my belongings, and I simply said I that everything was secure. They got closer and said sorry. Nothing came flying out my truck. The material is soft, but really strong and the clips to secure it in place...well that was thoughtful and really helpful. Thank you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Net is Great Quality.  No Snagging.  But carabiners are cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This covers the bed of an F-150 nicely. If you're stacking things high throughout the whole bed, you might want a longer net to cover the entire bed. Carabiners are pretty cheap and often get stuck open to where you need to manually snap the metal spring back into place. That's annoying. But the net quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: William Elliott

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty and Tangle Free!
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few different Cargo Nets over the years, some good, some less so. They all had one thing in common, they were a hassle to get them stretched out and over the load because the plastic hooks would always catch on the net and I'd have to untangle them. Not so with this net. The D-hooks don't tangle and they are stronger than the plastic hooks. Also, this net seems to be a LOT heavier duty than the ones I've used in the past. This is by far the best cargo net that I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: E. Finley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well made. Does the job. Stretches more than you would think it does. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Neshan

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Once I experimented with it for a while, this product works great for hauling brush and cardboard. Easy to use and keeps stuff from blowing out of my truck ......
customer_reviews.author: Ernie V. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Overall, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bungie system for a 2,500 mile road trip. The system fit perfectly in the back of my tocoma's 6 foot bed but stank a little right out of the bag. With some extra bungee cord supports (thank you home depot) everything stayed safe and secure in the bed. I felt like the carabiners were perfect for the light load of camping equipment. At the end of the trip the bungee system was slightly more stretched out then when we started. Overall this product was perfect for giving me some peace of mind as we traveled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great BUY
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! No more buckets and other stuff tumbling around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic product! We just drove cross country with the ...
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic product! We just drove cross country with the 8' bed of our RAM pickup full of plastic bins with suspect lids as well as other items. We covered everything with a plastic tarp then secured it all with just this bungee cargo net. It was so easy to clip on! No need to ratchet cargo straps or hook multiple bungee cords. It stretched to cover the whole truck bed. Everything stayed secure through wind and even torrential rain storms. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Prince

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: This cargo net LIVES in the bed of my truck and I have already used it many times for stabilizing cargo and also used it to just keep stuff from flying out of the bed while going down the freeways. The bungee material has not lost elasticity so far and doesn't snag on stuff. The included carabinier clips work great even if they are a bit less than premium quality. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: petro13

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this net to secure a tarp over a load on my 5X8 trailer. The net and carabiners it came with held up well and did a good job of securing the tarp and preventing it from flapping in the wind. I'm sure I will get lots of use out of this. My only complaint is that the carrying bag ripped during the first use. It would be nice if it came with a more durable, reusable carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Glad I went with this Cargo Net
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this cargo net, but I did get it out of the box and checked it to make sure there were no problems. It appears to be good, strong quality and the carabiners appear to be good quality as well. I don't anticipate having any problems when I use it on my truck for keeping things secured in the bed. I am glad that I went with this one since it has the carabiners versus some of the other cargo nets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Toyota Tacoma 6ft bed
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I really like the small 4" openings, thicker bungee material and the D-Clips. The size fits nicely in my 6 ft. bed. One minor problem I have is my bed liner only has connection points for the D-Clips in the corners. I solved this by using plastic clips from a previous net. I drilled a hole to fit the D-Clip through, then clipped the side points where needed to the upper edge lip of the bed liner. Works just like my previous net.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just in time for a haul !
customer_reviews.text: I received as a gift! It was just what I needed. I was not expecting this cargo net to be neatly packed in its own carry case. Strong winds blew down a front yard tree yesterday-loaded up the debris in my Tacoma, and secured the load with my new net. Using its metal connectors from net to truck bed was stellar! Thanks! 👍
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Super Bungee Net!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for the price. I have used the netting several times especially securing the cargo going to the dump. Fits nicely on the short bed of a truck. Easily folds and tangle free. Stores nicely in the provided case. If I were to make any improvements on this product would be to choose a different color on the corners of the netting for easy of identification and hooking up. That is a simple fix if you go to your locate home improvement store or Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: VirgoSuite71

customer_reviews.title: Awesome net for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome net for the price. Comes with everything you need to install it (as long as you have the hooks in your truck bed). Came with 12 carabiners for clipping it in which was more than needed. The only negative I've run into is the carabiners provided are a bit small if you want to use them with a Ford boxlink system. They still fit, but it's tight and can take some elbow grease to get them on and off. Can't beat the deal for how much you pay though, really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dayne

customer_reviews.title: good tool. Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great kit with awesome quality. Best value for the money!! Update. Dropped to 3 stars only because I had a seized caliper that would barely move and I ended up bending the t-handle portion. It says it’s got a lifetime warranty but company won’t get back with me Update again!! I emailed the company and told them about bending the handle and they sent me a whole new set!!! Best customer service ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd one so I obviously like it well enough. Pretty good product when new. They do wear out though and lose elasticity and the plastic spring loaded clips do break. If you leave it in the weather it goes much faster. Rolling up and storing after each use is recommended to extend useful life.
customer_reviews.author: K. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Did the job...
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well holding a tarp in place over furniture we were transporting on a rainy day The net is very stretchy, so we had to pullout very tight to keep the tarp from billowing in the wind as we drove The included carabiners were perfect for holding the net in lace on the truck bed tie down points
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great initiative and quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems like great quality. Before I even opened the package they took the initiative to check on to make sure the right color carabiners were included. My order was accurate and the quality looks lots better than some of the other ones I’ve looked at and owned in the past. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: LNB Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t stress out, just put the net on your bed.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Enough hooks for any amount or any height of the things goes in your bed. Flexible enough yet still strong. I bought my first pick up truck and little worried about things flying out of the bed and almost regret that maybe big suv was better idea than truck but this net fixed all issues that I concerned.
customer_reviews.author: James Y. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for F150 bed. Comes in a little case to keep it under the seat until you need it. Never tangles, used on multiple camping trips to make sure everything stays tucked into the bed. Also comes with more carbiners than you'll ever need. It's a great purchase and it should come standard with every F150 sold.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Thompson

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product well built has every adapter you will need. Saved the the day when i was working on my BMW. Thank You for the great brake tool and LIFE TIME GUARANTEE.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCO

customer_reviews.title: Be careful how you use it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first time I used it. The second time was a different story. More than likely it was my own fault. I had tarped my load and put the cargo net over it and the carabiners to hold the net down. I assume the wind is what broke six of the carabiners and the net in three spots. Like I said, it was more than likely my own fault but I am not really impressed with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I was transporting a bed full of mismatched, big weird stuff to the dump. It's nice to just cast this thing over the whole lot and know that it's all secure. MUCH easier than running a bunch of bungees back and forth across the whole mess. I clipped it to the cleats in my bed, and even to the bed extender, with the tailgate down. It comes in a nice little zipper bag for storage. I keep it under one of my back-seats in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Matt in NH

customer_reviews.title: Best price and very sturdy construction, made changing brakes easy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does what it is supposed to and very well made at a great price. I recommend this product if you plan on doing the breaks on your vehicle. Comes with a large assortment of parts to make it easy to do a lot of different vehicles. Just be sure to read the instructions provided to make sure you are using the correct end pieces for the calipers on your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Coplin SR

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the truck bed
customer_reviews.text: We have a cabin in the mountains so almost every weekend we lug a truckload of items in the bed of the truck for the 2-hour drive. Husband is always checking his mirrors to ensure nothing bounces out so I thought this net would ease his mind. We've used it several times and he loves it. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Includes decent plastic zippered case. Appears to be of good quality and robust construction, including the clips. Fits nicely on my 4x6 utility trailer, although the trailer itself suffers from a lack of convenient locations for attaching the clips.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few of these and this is probably the best one I've had. Good quality material and so far holds up to whatever I put in the bed of my truck. The caribeeners are a great improvement over the plastic clips that most brands provide. I will typically string a straight bungee along each side of the bed and then tie this one off to those bungees. Everything stays in place and in the truck bed FYI: I don't give 5 star reviews Superdavethecarpenter
customer_reviews.author: Superdavethecarpenter

customer_reviews.title: The product worked great for the first 10 times of use
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great for the first 10 times of use. Then the clips began to break. They need to upgrade the quality of the clips they use. About half of them are broken and unusable now and the cargo net is only 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Schuetz

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted one of these so when he takes cans to the recycle center, he could easily strap them down. It works great for this. We also helped our daughter move and used it to throw over some items on the back of trailer to keep from shifting. Works great. Seems to be made sturdy and comes in a bag that you can easily fold back up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Good just make sure you get the Caribbeaners
customer_reviews.text: First one was missing parts so I had to have Amazon send my another. Did get a message from the company and they had offered to refund my money and I could keep, so that was nice.......this product has worked excellent for me, good quality and will pull down tight with out slipping Is just a tade small for my truck, but not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nitta

customer_reviews.title: Nice set with flimsy case
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase after struggling using needle nose vise grips to crank in the caliper pistons. Appears to have everything I will need. To bad they do not put the tools in a more durable case.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzlym

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: We have a new baby and travel a lot. We bought this on a whim so we could just throw things like his char in the bed of the truck and not worry about it being too light and flying out. It arrived quickly and works well. It comes in a little carrying case so it can be put away nicely under the back seat so it is always handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Oesterblad

customer_reviews.title: Has the VW / Audi adapter
customer_reviews.text: I received the brake tool kit on time. I mainly ordered it because it contains the VW/Audi disc. I had already completed my brake job so I was not able to use it right away. But I did put the pieces together to see how it would work - it certainly looks like it will make the job easier the next time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: This item worked exactly what we needed it for -
customer_reviews.text: This product came a day early and by the end of the next day my nephew had his brakes changed. Saved himself from a very expensive expenditure if a shop or the dealer had to replace his brakes. And now I have a tool for when anyone in the family needs it, since they all have the same Make and Model of car but each one is a different year.
customer_reviews.author: Ladymatriarch

customer_reviews.title: Best net I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty cargo net, I have not used it yet! But I’m sure it’s going to give me years of service. Come September 2019 it will be used on a trailer being hauled from Tennessee to Colorado. Road test to come. I don’t think I’ll have any problems with it, best cargo net I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Sharks Bite 1

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Net works well. Used it on my 6.5’ bed F150 all weekend for moving. The bungees don’t snap or fray but the knots that keep the net together hav started to untie. I’ve been constantly retying the ends that unknot but overall the product is pretty solid
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It works!  Size of net is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Great product. I should have gotten this a long time ago but thought I could use bungee cords just as effectively and efficiently. Bungee cords work well but this is just GREAT! I leave this on all the time and just slide stuff over the tailgate and under the net and my stuff rides in place and I don’t have to worry about it bouncing around and ending up being damaged. I have a short bed GMC Canyon. Comes with a nice storage bag but I’m not using that because I leave the net on.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service, Lifetime Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I really like this net, it comes in handy for so many things! I did have one issue where the net rubbed against an item I had it over (bbq grill) and actually broke. However, I contacted the seller and they responded immediately and honored the lifetime warranty, which was very impressive service. Don’t be afraid to take a chance on this net or the seller, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Easy to stow
customer_reviews.text: This net has a tighter grid than most I've seen, less chance of something slipping through. Lightweight, doesn't tangle, stuffs and stows easily in the bag, plenty of hooks ... nice product. Perfect for my Ranger Sport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: As my title states, this product is exactly as advertised. Well made & it will be the last one you need to buy unless you need another one for another vehicle etc. The fact that it's actually tangle free is absolutely wonderful. Clips are sturdy & easy to use. I even got it back in the case on my second try. I should have paid more attention when I unfolded it so I could have been able to get it back in one my first try.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cargo Net
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after using one that a friend had bought. It's a bit of a pain to set it up and get it installed, but that might be par for the course w/ this type of product. It works very well, tho.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tie down bulky items - I like that it has a storage bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice weight of bungee - not too thin. Works very well for tying down loads of boxes. I would recommend buying another 10 or so small carabiners to help pull it down more evenly. Perfect size for my RAM 1500 Crew Cab with the short bed.
customer_reviews.author: noworries99

customer_reviews.title: Solid cargo net
customer_reviews.text: This net is really solid. Thick, heavy netting, but in a good way. Carabiners are a nice touch in that you use only whats needed for the particular load. They also wont get all tangled if you dont remove them before putting the net back in the case. I've had it for one week and have used it only once, so I cant speak to its durability. I dont expect any issues though. Lots of good reviews to back it up... Rob........
customer_reviews.author: J. Beaty

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We used this for the first time on a trip out of state, and it turned out to be one of the best purchases we've made, I dont know what we would have done without it. Great quality and kept everything in place and secure! Even comes with a carrying case that is compact enough that we just keep it under the back seat of the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Glad I have it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to use. Already used it to move a whole set of deck furniture in my F150. Carabiners are perfect size and very sturdy. Net is very easy to fold up and unfold, no tangles.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother. And don't pay any attention to their "compatibility list," it's nonsense.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, could not find any combination of plates that worked for my 91 MR2 brakes. Burned a ton of daylight, then had to make due with my piece of junk "cube" brake caliper turner, busting my knuckles. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: dog milk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect net to keep load from blowing off the truck bed
customer_reviews.text: I use this cargo net on my 2018 Toyota Tacoma to hold down light loads. It’s the perfect size and tough. I especially like the d rings rather than a bunch of hooks that can become a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: BrianR

customer_reviews.title: Best netting ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to Utilize this netting in conjunction with my roof rack and didn't have any issues during the 16 to 20 hour trip to Orlando, Florida(started my trip in Steubenville, Ohio)The netting kept all luggage and baby highchair securely tight to the ROOF RACK... from 1 to 10 in satisfaction, I would give it a ten...
customer_reviews.author: IRMA D.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Cargo Net
customer_reviews.text: I got this net to secure a couch and chair set my wife had purchased. After loading them into the back of my truck, we put a strap along the back to hold them in and the net over top to hold them in place. It was able to stretch over the whole couch and chair. It kept them held together going up to 75 mph on the highway. This was a great purchase and wholly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This net is really nice.
customer_reviews.text: I had a net for my old truck with an 8' bed but it was too big for my 6 1⁄2' bed and was over 10 years old. The new net is much thicker that the old one and has great "bungieness", it's really stretchy. The spring clips are pretty cool too when hooking to the clips built into the bed of the truck. The only con is I wish it came with some plastic hooks as well as the aluminum ones. When I am clipping I want to make sure that I'm not scratching the paint along the bed rails.
customer_reviews.author: D. Skin

customer_reviews.title: Consider bed hooks if your truck doesn’t have them.
customer_reviews.text: Had this in use for a few months. Very well built, has plenty of hooks and seems to have the right dimensions and stretch for an 8’ bed. I have nothing but good things to say about this product. I would recommend it to anyone needing cargo retention systems.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Varn Harper

customer_reviews.title: It secures with simple clips, you have to have  a place to clip them.
customer_reviews.text: We used this to cover a load of our daughters stuff in plastic garbage bags in the pickup bed. It was easy to secure and kept the bags intact and from flipping in the wind. We had it clipped in 8 places
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: I used the 4x6 Cargo net to move some of my daughter's stuff from So. Calif. to N. Calif. The net did its job and all items were kept safe and under warps. The only suggestion is that the carabiners could have been more robust. One of mine, under a side load, was damaged and it us now unusable. I still have plenty more.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Cargo Netting Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I’d ordered this years ago! Outstanding cargo net. Materials are extremely high quality. Perfect fit for my 2017 F150 bed. The carabiners make securing the net a cinch! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tofoggin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monster Strength!
customer_reviews.text: This net is super strong and stretches great. The carabiners are a little harder than my old net with hooks, but it all works for the better! Highly recommend this cargo net!! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: CKK&cats

customer_reviews.title: Good product, quick delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Nobody in my area had this left and right side caliper depress tool. Tried every auto part store to rent one but only had the right side. Nice kit, and case. For a Ford transit this is a must. Tool preformed well.
customer_reviews.author: Randi West

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty and very Durable! Didn't expect this to be so heavy duty and a nice heavy weight so it doesn't bounce. Wish I had purchased one sooner for the truck as it keeps everything from sliding and moving.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Good price and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: The cargo net arrived quickly and it was exactly as advertised. I haven't had a chance to use it yet, but it appears to be well-made and sturdy. I had one a few years ago for a different truck and the bungee cord that the new one is made of is definitely heavier. I also like the carry case because it will be a lot easier to keep it in the back of the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Disc Brake Caliper Tool
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything needed for what seems to be every car. Adapters for pistons that need to rotate in as well as those that only need to be pushed back. Price was much better than local parts stores (although most will rent/loan the tools, for the price, having my own is worth it).
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My husband would give it a 10+ if he could! So easy and works so well he used to use tarps and bungee cords. You just throw this over the top of your load clip it and go!
customer_reviews.author: debi

customer_reviews.title: ... product once so far and it did it's job good stretch over the load I was carrying with no ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had a chance to use this product once so far and it did it's job good stretch over the load I was carrying with no problems it appears to be a well made product. I'll be using it a few more times in the coming days if I have any problems I'll be sure to rewrite this review but for now I would recommend this to others
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Bought this For Future Need
customer_reviews.text: I've used a friends cargo net for a couple of years for a specific once a year load of firewood. I decided it was time to buy one of my own. I haven't used it yet, I suspect I'll use it next September. All I really know about it is that it's a lot heavier in weight than the one I've used previously & the hooks are better.
customer_reviews.author: Foothillson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: I researched these cargo nets and chose this one. Haven't used it yet, but it's easy to see I made the right choice. Very heavy duty and I expect it will last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very versatile
customer_reviews.text: This worked great on my F150. Comes with plenty of hooks which was very helpful and a reusable storage bag to keep neatly in your vehicle. You can easily stretch to whatever size you need and material is nice and thick. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Hall

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose net for so many things!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this cargo net a few times now. It worked great for moving a huge couch that hung way off my truck bed. It even works as a divider for when I get groceries. It’s a great net.
customer_reviews.author: Josh E.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty net! You will not me disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This net is great! Heavyweight net holds everything there it needs to be. The d rings allow you to adjust the anchor points where you need them. Better quality then you would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Spark99

customer_reviews.title: No issues, worked as it should after figuring out right disc
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly as described. Seems to be good quality. Used it on an ‘08 Acura no issues. Only negative thing is the listing doesn’t really make sense. Had to play around with several of the discs before i found one that worked. Definitely beats the C Clamp method.
customer_reviews.author: Phil H

customer_reviews.title: It keeps your stuff down
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I've used several nets that rely on pre-configured plastic hooks for attaching to your truck bed and inevitably their in the wrong place. Using the carabiners (sp?) that come with this net is great. You can move them to the ideal points to hold down your cargo. Nice heavy weight. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JasonO

customer_reviews.title: Best Brake Tool Ever
customer_reviews.text: I both this after renting a similar tool from Oreillys. This tool beats the rental by far and the options it has, makes it amazing.
customer_reviews.author: The Johnsons

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and easy to use cargo net. Far superior to the cheaper net that Had used. Net repacks easily into its plastic pouch. Best of all, it folds easily for storing and does not tangle up when using.
customer_reviews.author: Lurch

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and stretched across the entire bed of my truck. I would recommend this to any one moving or needing to hold items down. Combine with a tarp for full protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah S.

customer_reviews.title: DIY quality.
customer_reviews.text: Broke a piece already. Bought the replacement from cornwell, because they sell the same set for 130 dollars. It’s alright, good for actuated calipers, but all around feels pretty cheap and not suggested for use in a professional setting.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Franks

customer_reviews.title: Great net
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed! We bought a 6' x 8' utility trailer for our outback and had to move our stuff out of storage. This net fit over boxes and odd shaped items perfectly. One of my best purchases ever! I am so glad we purchased it, it was a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: LMT

customer_reviews.title: tool looks good the only problem i see is the latches on ...
customer_reviews.text: tool looks good the only problem i see is the latches on the case won't last long before breaking off good deal for the money
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2014 ford escape
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for the 1 project I bought it for 2014 ford escape I guess not all kits have the adapter for some fords. The plates and adapters all seem to be made of heavy enough material, seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: rick n

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to the tool box
customer_reviews.text: The case seems solid enough for the items. The tool itself seems to be good enough for the home gamer though if you do brake work for a living I am not sure this one will last through to many changes. The press itself was designed well and incorporates a magnet that assists with adapter retention which is a nice feature
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Harleman

customer_reviews.title: Great net
customer_reviews.text: This net is great because it has a small mesh size and seems heavier than other nets I've worked with. The large size allowed ample room to stack the gear high in the truck bed without stressing the net with too much tension (Dodge Ram 6.5' short bed). The carabiners worked well when there were loops on the truck bed to clip on to, but I did buy some additional hooks to supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Janene Auger

customer_reviews.title: Good net minus the D clips
customer_reviews.text: The net itself is great; I have no complaints. It's actually more heavy duty than I expected, so I was pleased there. The D clips that were included are terrible though- 1 was missing the spring right out of the package, and the spring broke in 2 others on the first use. They felt like dollar store material. Picked up some similar, but sturdier, clips at the auto parts store for a few dollars and solved that problem. Overall, I give it 4 stars because the net itself is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

product_meta.title: 4'x6' Super Duty Truck Cargo Net for Pickup Truck Bed Stretches to 8'x12' | 12 Tangle-free [STEEL] Carabiners | Small 4”x4” [LATEX] Bungee Net Mesh Holds Small and Large Loads Tighter
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY SUPERIOR DURABILITY LATEX CORE (not rubber) (Upgraded Materials January 2020) – Crafted with extra thick 5mm LATEX (not rubber) bungee webbing, the Grit Performance cargo netting is the thickest on the market. As a result it doubles in size to 8' x 12' (96"x144") and holds strong under the harshest conditions.

STEEL CARABINERS (NOT aluminum) (Upgraded Materials January 2020) – 12 adjustable STEEL carabiners provide convenient, TANGLE-FREE tie-down and storage & gives users the ability to quickly strap down large truck & trailer loads by simply moving clips from 1 mesh square to another. Perfect solution for LARGE TRUCK BED LOADS for camping, moving or dump runs in your pickup or trailer.

IDEAL FOR SMALL & LARGE CARGO ITEMS – Designed with tight 4” x 4” mesh squares, the truck bed net keeps small items from falling out and provides more strength and protection when stretched over larger cargo items such as ice chests, luggage, tarps and more.

STORAGE BAG FOR EASY STOWING – Each net with carabiners comes with a convenient zipper storage bag so users can store the netting under the seat, in the trunk or garage. The bungee net folds up and sets into the bag, frustration-free. There is nothing more irritating than a tangled net and hooks strewn all over the floor boards or trunk.

FREE REPLACEMENT LIFETIME GUARANTEE – Any issues? We'll make it right EVERY TIME. Just Ask. Forget about product returns. Get in touch with us. We'll make it easy. We back up our claim that this bungee net is the best on the market. You can rest easy with your purchase. Simply register your product when you receive it and let us know if you ever experience an issue… Even if it is years from now.
